byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Kareem Fahim reported from Misurata, and Rick Gladstone from New York. Adam Nossiter contributed reporting from Tripoli, Libya.

abstract: Top Libyan military officials report that the bodies of Col Muammar el-Qaddafi, his son Muatassim and former defense minister Abu Bakr Younes were buried in a predawn funeral at a secret location.
snippet: The military council in Misurata said a funeral and burial were held at a secret location for Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi, his son and his former defense minister.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity

lead_paragraph: The military council in Misurata said a funeral and burial were held at a secret location for Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi, his son and his former defense minister.

headline.main: Qaddafi, Son and Former Defense Aide Buried in Secret Place
headline.print_headline: Qaddafi, Son and Former Defense Aide Buried in Secret Place
